venue.name: Smoothie King Center
venue.address: 1501 Dave Dixon Dr, New Orleans, LA 70113

Courtside.Description: Front-row seats offering an unparalleled view and engagement with the game.
Courtside.View_Quality: Unmatched view at court level, placing fans in the heart of the action.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Opportunity for direct interaction with players and high chance of being featured on live television.
Courtside.Accessibility: Premium access with some restrictions for personal mobility devices.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to VIP clubs, complimentary high-end cuisine, and top-notch service.

Club_Seats.Description: Elevated seats along the sideline that come with access to premium amenities for a superior viewing experience.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Optimal sideline perspective for a full view of the game.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Superior comfort with additional space and exclusive access areas.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Easy entrance with dedicated access, close to elevators.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Admission to private lounges, premium dining options, and in-seat service.

Skybox.Description: Private suites offering a plush setting for enjoying the game with guests.
Skybox.View_Quality: Secluded and elevated, with sweeping views of the court.
Skybox.Unique_Features: Opulent seating, exclusive food and beverage service, and personalized attention.
Skybox.Accessibility: VIP entrance and private elevators for a seamless experience.
Skybox.Special_Perks: Maximum comfort and privacy, with access to elite clubs and priority booking for events.

Upper_Level.Description: More economical seating choices that provide a broad view of the arena and the vibrant atmosphere of the game.
Upper_Level.View_Quality: Elevated perspective, perfect for fans who appreciate a panoramic view of the game's dynamics.
Upper_Level.Unique_Features: A cost-effective way to be part of the Pelicans' fanbase and enjoy the excitement.
Upper_Level.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, with straightforward access to the upper levels via escalators and elevators.
Upper_Level.Special_Perks: An affordable option for experiencing the thrill of a live game, suitable for group outings.

restaurants_bars.name: Walk-Ons Bistreaux & Bar
restaurants_bars.description: A lively sports bar offering a mix of Cajun and American dishes, known for its vibrant atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: Mannings Eat-Drink-Cheer
restaurants_bars.description: Features a large selection of craft beers and classic American fare in a sports-themed setting.

restaurants_bars.name: Dragos Seafood Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for its charbroiled oysters, Drago's offers a taste of local seafood cuisine near the Smoothie King Center.

restaurants_bars.name: Borgne
restaurants_bars.description: Chef John Besh's restaurant focusing on Louisiana seafood, offering a modern take on local cuisine.

restaurants_bars.name: Mothers Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: An iconic spot known for its po' boys and hearty New Orleans comfort food, a true taste of the city's culinary heritage.

restaurants_bars.name: Herbsaint
restaurants_bars.address: 701 St Charles Ave, New Orleans, LA 70130
restaurants_bars.description: A flagship restaurant of Chef Donald Link, offering French-Southern cuisine with an emphasis on local ingredients.

accommodations.name: Hyatt Regency New Orleans
accommodations.description: This upscale hotel offers modern rooms and is conveniently located close to the Pelicans' venue.

accommodations.name: Hilton New Orleans Riverside
accommodations.description: Offers comfortable accommodations and easy access to both the Smoothie King Center and local attractions.

accommodations.name: The Roosevelt New Orleans, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel
accommodations.description: Luxurious and historic, this hotel offers elegant rooms, a rooftop bar, and a spa, located near the French Quarter.

accommodations.name: Le Pavillon Hotel
accommodations.description: Known for its classic luxury and historic charm, offering a unique stay in the heart of New Orleans.

accommodations.name: Ace Hotel New Orleans
accommodations.description: A trendy hotel with a vibrant atmosphere, featuring live music and a rooftop pool, close to arts and entertainment districts.

accommodations.name: The Ritz-Carlton, New Orleans
accommodations.description: Set in the historic French Quarter, this luxury hotel offers refined rooms and a world-class spa.

tourist_attractions.name: French Quarter
tourist_attractions.description: The historic heart of New Orleans, known for its vibrant nightlife, colorful buildings, and jazz music.

tourist_attractions.name: National WWII Museum
tourist_attractions.description: A must-visit for history enthusiasts, offering immersive exhibits on the American experience in World War II.

tourist_attractions.name: Jackson Square
tourist_attractions.description: A historic park in the heart of the French Quarter, known for its beautiful landscapes, street artists, and the iconic St. Louis Cathedral.

tourist_attractions.name: Audubon Aquarium of the Americas
tourist_attractions.description: Features a vast array of aquatic life from the Americas and beyond, offering an immersive underwater experience.

tourist_attractions.name: Garden District
tourist_attractions.description: Famous for its well-preserved antebellum mansions, lush gardens, and Southern charm, offering a glimpse into the city's rich history.

tourist_attractions.name: City Park
tourist_attractions.description: One of the nation's oldest urban parks, featuring beautiful landscapes, the New Orleans Museum of Art, and numerous outdoor activities.

team_related_activities.name: Pelicans Team Shop at Smoothie King Center
team_related_activities.address: 1501 Dave Dixon Dr, New Orleans, LA 70113
team_related_activities.description: The official store for New Orleans Pelicans merchandise, located within the Smoothie King Center.

team_related_activities.name: Pelicans Practice Facility Tour
team_related_activities.description: Exclusive tours of the Pelicans' state-of-the-art practice facility, offering fans a behind-the-scenes look at the team's preparation.

team_related_activities.name: Pelicans Game Day Experience
team_related_activities.address: 1501 Dave Dixon Dr, New Orleans, LA 70113
team_related_activities.description: Special game day packages that include pre-game activities, meet-and-greets with mascots, and exclusive access to certain areas of the Smoothie King Center.

options.description: The New Orleans Streetcar Line has stops near the Smoothie King Center, offering a scenic route to the game.
Several bus routes run through downtown New Orleans, providing convenient access to the venue.
Uber and Lyft are widely available throughout New Orleans, offering easy and convenient transportation to and from Pelicans games.
Blue Bikes New Orleans offers a healthy and environmentally friendly way to get to the Smoothie King Center, with several docking stations nearby.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Pelicans tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Pelicans tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets for weekday games can often save money. Group discounts may be available for large parties. Look out for promotional nights for additional savings.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Ensure tickets are bought from verified sources to avoid scams. Secondary marketplaces with buyer guarantees are safer. Avoid purchasing printed tickets directly from sellers near the venue.
